label: NA
definition: Comma Separated Value (CSV) file containing Event data for the Integrated Stream Habitat Data. This table corresponds to the 'Event' table in the database (.accdb) file.

label: eventDate
definition: The calendar date of the event.

label: eventID
definition: Global unique identifier assigned to an Event (something that occurs at a place and time, such as a survey or measurement).

label: eventRemarks
definition: Comments or notes about the Event. The description of flow for the reach flow, partial flow or dry.

label: fieldNotes
definition: One of notes taken in the field about the Event.

label: locationID
definition: Unique global identifier assigned to the location where the event occurred.

label: samplingProtocol
definition: The name of, reference to, or description of the stream survey method or protocol used during an Event.
examples: UV light trap, "mist net", "bottom trawl", "ad hoc observation", "point count", "Penguins from space: faecal stains reveal the location of emperor penguin colonies, http://dx.doi.org/10.1111/j.1466-8238.2009.00467.x", "Takats et al. 2001. Guidelines for Nocturnal Owl Monitoring in North America. Beaverhill Bird Observatory and Bird Studies Canada, Edmonton, Alberta. 32 pp.", "http://www.bsc-eoc.org/download/Owl.pdf"

label: verbatimEventID
definition: The verbatim event ID from the originating source dataset assigned by the program.

label: year
definition: The four-digit year in which the event occurred.
